topPRs.title: chore: update zod pckg version
topPRs.author: 0xbbjoker
topPRs.body:
<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **Chores**
  * Upgraded the validation library to the latest major version across CLI, Core, plugins, and starter templates for improved compatibility, stability, and security.
  * Aligned dependency resolutions across packages; no feature changes introduced.

* **Refactor**
  * Strengthened validation for configuration maps, ensuring keys are treated as strings for clearer error messages and more predictable behavior. No breaking API changes expected for typical usage.

<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

topPRs.title: fix(ci): stabilize Docker image build (Bun 1.2.21, Buildx cache, concurrency)
topPRs.author: wtfsayo
topPRs.body:
Stabilize Docker image builds in CI by aligning Bun to 1.2.21, enabling Buildx with GitHub Actions cache, constraining parallelism, and adding diagnostics and disk cleanup.

**Diff vs develop**
```
2 files changed, 51 insertions(+), 9 deletions(-)
.github/workflows/image.yaml | +46/-6
Dockerfile                   | +14/-3
```

**Changed files**
- `.github/workflows/image.yaml`
- `Dockerfile`

**Commits**
- e8f27c6c1d fix(ci): stabilize Docker image build â€” align Bun to 1.2.21; add verbose build diagnostics; limit Turbo concurrency; set up Buildx with GHA cache; reduce parallelism; add disk cleanup; add 60m timeout.
- cea94ffeea Refine Docker image workflow for efficiency and clarity.

**Why**
- Previous workflow failed when `bun run build` exited 1 inside Docker build.
- CI image used Bun 1.2.5 while local used 1.2.21; unify to 1.2.21.
- CI hosts are resource constrained; limit build parallelism and clean disk before build.
- Add diagnostics for faster root-cause when failures happen.

**Key changes**
- Dockerfile:
  - Install `bun@1.2.21` and `turbo@2.3.3`.
  - Add environment diagnostics (Node, Bun, memory, CPU, disk) before build.
  - Constrain build: `TURBO_CONCURRENCY=2 bun run build --concurrency=2 --verbose`; on failure, print system state.
- Workflow (`.github/workflows/image.yaml`):
  - Add `timeout-minutes: 60`.
  - Free disk space (remove large SDKs, prune Docker images).
  - Set up Buildx with log size limits and `max-parallelism = 2`.
  - Use GHA cache: `cache-from: type=gha` and `cache-to: type=gha,mode=max`.
  - Use `linux/amd64` single-arch for stability.
  - Keep build provenance attestation.

**Expected outcome**
- More stable and reproducible Docker image builds; faster subsequent builds via cache; clearer diagnostics on failure.

**Test plan**
- CI: run workflow via `workflow_dispatch` and verify successful build and push to GHCR.
- Manual: local `docker build` validates Bun version parity and constrained build succeeds.

**Links**
- Failed job for reference: `https://github.com/elizaOS/eliza/actions/runs/17969674458/job/51109114397`
